document_data.name: Demon Spawn
document_data.mainbody: A '''demon spawn''' was a type of [[demon]] that often allied themselves with cults, although they yearned for the [[Abyss]]. As a result, they often sought out [[demongate]]s to bring forth their kin to the world. Demon spawn were the products of dark rituals and were often the end result of the work of a [[hag]]. Demon spawn varied greatly in appearance, but it was certain was that they were shunned by their families and communities and, as a result, held nothing but contempt in their hearts as they attempted to better understand their inherent abilities.
document_data.Abilities: Demon spawn were capable of using powerful magic.
document_data.Combat: Demon spawn attempted to keep melee enemies at bay as they relied on their magic during combat.
